column4: hi there....Im new to  ubuntu and trying to setup SVN but it says Errors were encountered while processing: libapache2-svn
any idea
did you search google or the ubuntu forums for the problem ?
i would imagine you dont need apache2 to use svn
I was following a tutorial so i tried that
there might be a better tutorial in the ubuntu server guidee
is it forcing you to install libapache2-svn or are you telling it to install that specific package ?
u know what ....Iam new to SVN as well since Im a C# developer
so i was following a tutorial n it says install subversion and libapache-svn
don't install libapache2-svn ... just subversion and see what happens
I tried that as well
next question .. do you have apache2 installed ?
i was assuming there was a way to connect to svn without http
i was playing with apache as well
why
I dont know.. it should work with http.. why not
any idea???
im thinking ....
trying to ... i got svn up and running without a problem ...but i also don't know what exact error you are getting
make sure to move your apache config files if you have edited them ... let the reinstall start the config fresh
yes :) i will get back to you in a bit.. lets see how it goes
